data.body: ask user if they want foolery to search for and auto-register agents such as claude, codex, gemini-cli.  if yes, see if claude, codex, or gemeni-cli is already installed.  if more than one agent is installed, prompt them for each of the actions we support, asking them which agent to use and what model.
data.description: ask user if they want foolery to search for and auto-register agents such as claude, codex, gemini-cli.  if yes, see if claude, codex, or gemeni-cli is already installed.  if more than one agent is installed, prompt them for each of the actions we support, asking them which agent to use and what model.
data.title: install prompts for agent scan and register
